title: Winnie the Pooh (2011 film)
summary: Winnie the Pooh is a 2011 American animated musical comedy film produced by Walt Disney Animation Studios and released by Walt Disney Pictures, based on the eponymous novel created by A. A. Milne and E. H. Shepard. The 51st animated film produced by the studio,[lower-alpha 1] the film is a revival of Disney's Winnie the Pooh franchise and the fifth theatrical Winnie the Pooh film released.
